scripts.dev:agent: cd packages/agent && source .venv/bin/activate && cd src && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.setup:agent: cd packages/agent && uv venv && source .venv/bin/activate && uv sync
scripts.ios:pods:reset: rm -rf apps/mobile/ios/Pods apps/mobile/ios/Podfile.lock && cd apps/mobile/ios && pod install
